Package usr.gustavo6046.lib.j2dex.input

This package is a higher level abstraction on Java2D's input listening methods.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    KeyInputHandler
    You *WILL* want to implement this interface when dealing with direct key input, e.g. game controls.
    MouseInputHandler
    Allows for the usage of mouse input in your game.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    KeyboardInput
    Helps a lot when handling with keyboard events.
    KeyDescription
    A small class that will help you when labeling and finding keys.
    MouseInput
    This class will allow you to make use of mouse events, like mouse input, directly into your game or project.
    TextInput
    Subclass this when dealing with text input in text fields and other similar things.

Package usr.gustavo6046.lib.j2dex.input Description

This package is a higher level abstraction on Java2D's input listening methods. This package was adapted specifically for use along with 2DEX.
Author:
Gustavo6046
